data.title: SiteGround Hosting 2019: Year In Review
data.meta_description: In 2019, our 15th year as a company, we raised the bar of our service, products, and initiatives even more. Check out our highlights, share our story and win amazing SiteGround prizes!
data.text:
Year in Review

Last year was an important milestone for us. It marked our 15th anniversary as a company. Ever since we started our journey in the hosting industry, we have always had one goal: to make our clients, team, and community HAPPY. Read below to see how we did it in 2019!

SHARE & WIN COOL PRIZES

This Year Was Extra Special: We Turned 15

We did so much in 15 years! SiteGround started as an idea of four university friends, and today, we are a BIG multinational family. Check out the videos below where some of our team members share what it means to be part of SiteGround.

You Get Even Faster and More Efficient Customer Support

Passing the 2-million domains mark on our servers in 2019 meant we needed to ensure all of them will continue to get the stellar customer service we’re known for. So we got even more efficient.

icon_outlined_ticket

90%

Tickets Resolution at

First Contact

50

New Customer Service

Reps Added

600+

Extra Trainings in

Customer Support

What Do Our Clients Say

In the end all that matters is whether our efforts made a difference for the people using our services on a daily basis. In addition to all your feedback throughout the year, our Annual Client Survey again showed stellar Client Satisfaction Rate!

98%

Customer Satisfaction Rate

That’s a Wrap!

Share our Recap and Win Some Cool Swag!

We are fortunate to be able to share so many memorable moments with so many amazing peoplе. To thank you for being part of the SiteGround journey and to commemorate our 15th anniversary, we have prepared 15 amazing gifts to give away to 15 people who help us spread the word by sharing our recap. To win one of the gifts, please share our recap in a public social media post or story and tag @SiteGround in it. Then fill in the form below before January 21, 2020 so you can enter the draw.

Share on:

Google Home Max

Anti-Theft Backpack

T-shirt

Sweatshirt

We’ll sеlect 15 of the submitted entries at random and send them our gifts within the month after the draw is closed.

Thank you for the interest in our giveaway! The submission form is now closed.
